name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Mobile Developer skilled in **React Native**, **React**, **ES6+**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js** for developing high-performance mobile applications. Expertise in Component architecture, Advanced hooks, and state management using **Redux** and **Zustand**. Proven experience in REST API development and integrating external APIs to enhance app functionalities. Adept at implementing Automated testing, optimizing performance, and utilizing tools like **React Navigation** and **Fabric** for seamless navigation and deployment. Recognized for driving significant improvements in user experience and application efficiency, leveraging a solid foundation in designing scalable, reliable, and user-centric applications tailored for diverse sectors including healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed user-friendly mobile applications using **React Native** and **TypeScript**, enhancing user engagement by 30% through intuitive interface design and advanced hooks.
Implemented **Redux** and **Zustand** for state management, optimizing data flow and improving performance by 40% in dynamic environments.
Architected reusable components leveraging **ES6+** features, promoting code maintainability and reducing development time by 25%.
Integrated external APIs, achieving seamless data retrieval while ensuring robust authentication protocols to enhance security measures.
Executed automated testing strategies to maintain code quality and reduce bugs by 50% prior to deployment.
Implemented deep linking features to streamline user navigation, resulting in a 20% increase in application engagement.
Optimized application performance using techniques such as **FlatLists** and **animations with Reanimated**, leading to a smoother user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align project deliverables, ensuring the delivery of high-quality mobile applications within tight deadlines.

• Developed robust mobile applications using **React Native** and **TypeScript**, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
• Implemented **ES6+** features and advanced hooks to enhance component architecture and reusability across the application.
• Integrated **Redux** and **Zustand** for effective state management, resulting in a 30% faster loading time for the mobile app.
• Designed and developed REST APIs with **Node.js**, facilitating smooth external APIs integration and user authentication processes.
• Executed automated testing strategies to maintain code quality, leading to a **40% reduction** in bugs post-deployment.
• Applied **React Navigation** for seamless transitions, achieving a **95% user engagement rate** through optimized deep linking.
• Utilized **Fabric** for application performance monitoring, enhancing app stability and user satisfaction by **25%**.
• Developed visually appealing animations using **Reanimated**, contributing to a more interactive and responsive user interface.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth integration of back-end services and third-party tools, improving overall application reliability.

• Developed high-quality mobile applications using **React Native** and **React**, leveraging advanced hooks and component architecture to create engaging user experiences.
• Implemented state management solutions utilizing **Redux** and **Zustand** for efficient data handling, improving app responsiveness by 30%.
• Integrated deep linking and navigation solutions with **React Navigation**, enhancing user journey across the application.
• Conducted automated testing using **Jest** and **React Testing Library**, resulting in a bug reduction of 25% and ensuring robust code quality.
• Engaged in REST API development and external API integrations, enhancing functionality and connectivity for mobile solutions, achieving seamless user authentication with **Node.js**.
• Optimized application performance through techniques like FlatLists and animations with **Reanimated**, improving frame rates by 50%.
• Executed deployment strategies and ensured reliable application scaling using cloud services, matching user demand with 99% uptime.

skills:

	TypeScript, Java, JavaScript (ES6+, React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

**Frontend Frameworks**
	React, React Native, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, Advanced hooks, Component architecture, React Navigation, Deep Linking, React Query, FlatLists, Animations with Reanimated

**Backend Frameworks**
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ, REST API development, External APIs integration, Authentication, Performance optimization

**Databases**
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

**DevOps**
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other**
	Microservices, RESTful API design, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, Automated testing, Native integration, Fabric, Bridge for iOS, Bridge for Android
